tv.generator-info-name: Original XML Generated with Tempest EPG Generator (made by Kvanc) - Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v0.9

programme.title: Bepanah
programme.desc: The story of two cousins Gul and Rushna who are polar opposites – one fearless and carefree while the other quiet and submissive. With just one wrong decision by Rushna both their lives change completely. But will this ill-judged decision by Rushna prove to be a blessing for Gul? Watch Bepanah to find out.

programme.title: Bikhray Hain Hum
programme.desc: Marriage with the love of your life should mean a happy ending, but with the unexpected death of the husband her life ceases to exist. Will she be able to pull herself together and find happiness or will she let people around her bring her down?

programme.title: Bakhtawar
programme.desc: From Bakhtawar to Bakhto, the journey of a young headstrong girl trying to escape her troubled home, difficulties and pain and create a better tomorrow for herself.With strive for change comes a series of sacrifices maybe even changing her identity. Will Bakhtawar be successful in doing so? Watch the drama to find out. Every Sunday at 8PM. Only on HUM TV.

programme.title: Bakhtawar
programme.desc: From Bakhtawar to Bakhto, the journey of a young headstrong girl trying to escape her troubled home, difficulties and pain and create a better tomorrow for herself.With strive for change comes a series of sacrifices maybe even changing her identity. Will Bakhtawar be successful in doing so? Watch the drama to find out. Every Sunday at 8PM. Only on HUM TV.

programme.title: Bikhray Hain Hum
programme.desc: Marriage with the love of your life should mean a happy ending, but with the unexpected death of the husband her life ceases to exist. Will she be able to pull herself together and find happiness or will she let people around her bring her down?

programme.title: Ishq-E-Laa
programme.desc: Embark on Ishq E Laa’s spiritual journey with a soulful young man lost in search of divinity and eternal love.For the first time ever, Azaan Sami Khan will be stepping into the acting world alongside the award winning Sajal Aly and Yumna Zaidi.Written by the peerless writer of Alif Allah Aur Insaan, Qaisera Hayat and directed by Amin Iqbal.

programme.title: Bepanah
programme.desc: The story of two cousins Gul and Rushna who are polar opposites – one fearless and carefree while the other quiet and submissive. With just one wrong decision by Rushna both their lives change completely. But will this ill-judged decision by Rushna prove to be a blessing for Gul? Watch Bepanah to find out.

programme.title: Agar
programme.desc: Agar is about a tale of three sisters, Qurrat ul ain, a girl who lived in the shadows of her image and dignity, Hooriya, a girl who lives in a world that only sees beauty and positivity and Chandni, a girl who has lived her entire life being deprived of appreciation and under the shadows of her two elder sisters. Watch Agar as the experiences these three girls face in their life teach them the importance of balance, every Tuesday at 8PM.The main characters of Agar are played by one of the most prominent actors in the modern drama industry. The cast includes Junaid Khan as Shahwaiz, Juggan Kazim as Annie, Hina Altaf as Hooriya, Usama Khan as Farrukh, Ali Abbas as Muthair, Hina Khawaja Bayat as Annie’s mother, Maheen Siddiqui as Chandni, Ismat Zaidi as Shahwaiz’s mother, Ahmed Randhawa as Behram, Behroze Sabzwari as Shahwaiz’s father, Hira Soomro as Zainab, Beena Masroor as Muthair’s mother, Saqib Sumeer, Fareeda Shabbir as Zainab’s mother, Salma Asim as Farrukh’s mother. With its melodious, OST Agar is already among the top favorites of people across the country.The drama serial Agar also highlights the different aspects of parenthood as a whole. Presenting different familial situations where parents, force their children into living the life of their choosing, and how it affects their mental health and decision power in the long run. Agar as a whole encompasses all weighty themes emphasizing the strength of communication and understanding between parents and children and also the significance of considerate decisions. Watch as the experiences they face in their lives teach them the importance of balance, every Tuesday at 8 PM.

programme.title: Kaala Doriya
programme.desc: Namesake and based on one of the most popular folk songs, what happens when two families despise each other and the guy and girl end up falling in love? All hell breaks loose but in an entertaining and humorous way.Will they be able to cross the hurdles thrown their way by family or will they power through to come together as one? Watch Kaala Doriya to find out.

programme.title: Bakhtawar
programme.desc: From Bakhtawar to Bakhto, the journey of a young headstrong girl trying to escape her troubled home, difficulties and pain and create a better tomorrow for herself.With strive for change comes a series of sacrifices maybe even changing her identity. Will Bakhtawar be successful in doing so? Watch the drama to find out. Every Sunday at 8PM. Only on HUM TV.

programme.title: Bepanah
programme.desc: The story of two cousins Gul and Rushna who are polar opposites – one fearless and carefree while the other quiet and submissive. With just one wrong decision by Rushna both their lives change completely. But will this ill-judged decision by Rushna prove to be a blessing for Gul? Watch Bepanah to find out.

programme.title: Bikhray Hain Hum
programme.desc: Marriage with the love of your life should mean a happy ending, but with the unexpected death of the husband her life ceases to exist. Will she be able to pull herself together and find happiness or will she let people around her bring her down?

programme.title: Wehem
programme.desc: Wehem is the story of a woman who leads an independent yet isolated life. While at the surface she seems caring, wonderful and filled with empathy for those around, the reality is very different. It isn’t until the drama’s lead, Kinza Hashmi reveals the truth about the negative protagonist played by Sawera Nadeem that those around become aware of her true colours.

programme.title: Meri Shehzadi
programme.desc: The story of Dania, raised by her grandfather – a dedicated follower and admirer of Princess Diana to the extent that he calls his granddaughter with the same name. Will the moniker of the princess face the same trials, tribulations and difficulties as her?

programme.title: Bepanah
programme.desc: The story of two cousins Gul and Rushna who are polar opposites – one fearless and carefree while the other quiet and submissive. With just one wrong decision by Rushna both their lives change completely. But will this ill-judged decision by Rushna prove to be a blessing for Gul? Watch Bepanah to find out.

With just one wrong decision by Rushna both their lives change completely. But will this ill-judged decision by Rushna prove to be a blessing for Gul? Watch Bepanah to find out.

programme.title: Wabaal
programme.desc: Can a person’s own malicious thoughts cause them to be destructive not only for others but for themsleves as well? Watch Wabaal to find out.

programme.title: Sang-E-Mah
programme.desc: ‘Gagh’ a Pashto word that translates to ailan or proclamation, even though illegal is an ongoing kabayali pathan rasm through which marriage is enforced by firing at a girl’s home.Sang E Mah revolves around the concept of gagh and encompasses the enactment of law to combat this tradition.Along with highlighting gagh, the tale of Sang E Mah comprises of a transcendent tale of love, and retribution between a father and son.

programme.title: Agar
programme.desc: Agar is about a tale of three sisters, Qurrat ul ain, a girl who lived in the shadows of her image and dignity, Hooriya, a girl who lives in a world that only sees beauty and positivity and Chandni, a girl who has lived her entire life being deprived of appreciation and under the shadows of her two elder sisters. Watch Agar as the experiences these three girls face in their life teach them the importance of balance, every Tuesday at 8PM.The main characters of Agar are played by one of the most prominent actors in the modern drama industry. The cast includes Junaid Khan as Shahwaiz, Juggan Kazim as Annie, Hina Altaf as Hooriya, Usama Khan as Farrukh, Ali Abbas as Muthair, Hina Khawaja Bayat as Annie’s mother, Maheen Siddiqui as Chandni, Ismat Zaidi as Shahwaiz’s mother, Ahmed Randhawa as Behram, Behroze Sabzwari as Shahwaiz’s father, Hira Soomro as Zainab, Beena Masroor as Muthair’s mother, Saqib Sumeer, Fareeda Shabbir as Zainab’s mother, Salma Asim as Farrukh’s mother. With its melodious, OST Agar is already among the top favorites of people across the country.The drama serial Agar also highlights the different aspects of parenthood as a whole. Presenting different familial situations where parents, force their children into living the life of their choosing, and how it affects their mental health and decision power in the long run. Agar as a whole encompasses all weighty themes emphasizing the strength of communication and understanding between parents and children and also the significance of considerate decisions. Watch as the experiences they face in their lives teach them the importance of balance, every Tuesday at 8 PM.

programme.title: Wabaal

programme.title: Tinkay Ka Sahara
programme.desc: With all her blood relatives failing her and being married to a person who isn’t even respected in his own house and is dependent on his family for finances, the protagonist played by Sonya Hussain struggles and finally works for a better tomorrow for her new family. However destiny has a different plan and the challenges in her life continue to grow. Is sadness, strive and grieve her only fate or will she ever find her forever happiness. Watch Tinkay Ka Sahara every Monday at 8PM to find out.

programme.title: Bisaat
programme.desc: Bisat | The Ultimate Story Of Love, Sacrifices, And Conspiracies.

programme.title: Dobara
programme.desc: When destiny gives her another chance to be youthful again and make up for the years she lost, she takes a leap of faith. But at what cost?Dobara realistically depicts the reality of every other young girl who is made to age by eons in a matter of minutes and take on responsibility well above her age.Such is the tale of Mehrunissa, played by the singer turned actor who proved herself through her outstanding acting in Raqeeb Se, Hadiqa Kiani alongside the actor who delivers nothing but super-hits Bilal Abbas Khan who is playing the protagonist.

programme.title: Bakhtawar

programme.title: Wehshi
programme.desc: Asif, a beloved son of his father becomes a victim of cruel fate when his father dies. With a step father that treats him poorly the built up anger and grieve reflects in Asif’s personality and that leads to him being labelled as Wehshi. Will this title lead to a self-fulfilling prophecy?Wehshi – Based on the novel by Razia Butt Sahiba. Dramatized and written by Shumaila Zaidi

programme.title: Bikhray Hain Hum
programme.desc: Marriage with the love of your life should mean a happy ending, but with the unexpected death of the husband her life ceases to exist. Will she be able to pull herself together and find happiness or will she let people around her bring her down?

programme.title: Kaala Doriya
programme.desc: Namesake and based on one of the most popular folk songs, what happens when two families despise each other and the guy and girl end up falling in love? All hell breaks loose but in an entertaining and humorous way.Will they be able to cross the hurdles thrown their way by family or will they power through to come together as one? Watch Kaala Doriya to find out.

programme.title: Bakhtawar
programme.desc: From Bakhtawar to Bakhto, the journey of a young headstrong girl trying to escape her troubled home, difficulties and pain and create a better tomorrow for herself.With strive for change comes a series of sacrifices maybe even changing her identity. Will Bakhtawar be successful in doing so? Watch the drama to find out. Every Sunday at 8PM. Only on HUM TV.

programme.title: Bepanah
programme.desc: The story of two cousins Gul and Rushna who are polar opposites – one fearless and carefree while the other quiet and submissive. With just one wrong decision by Rushna both their lives change completely. But will this ill-judged decision by Rushna prove to be a blessing for Gul? Watch Bepanah to find out.

programme.title: Wabaal
programme.desc: Can a person’s own malicious thoughts cause them to be destructive not only for others but for themsleves as well? Watch Wabaal to find out.

programme.title: Sang-E-Mah
programme.desc: ‘Gagh’ a Pashto word that translates to ailan or proclamation, even though illegal is an ongoing kabayali pathan rasm through which marriage is enforced by firing at a girl’s home.Sang E Mah revolves around the concept of gagh and encompasses the enactment of law to combat this tradition.Along with highlighting gagh, the tale of Sang E Mah comprises of a transcendent tale of love, and retribution between a father and son.

programme.title: Agar
programme.desc: Agar is about a tale of three sisters, Qurrat ul ain, a girl who lived in the shadows of her image and dignity, Hooriya, a girl who lives in a world that only sees beauty and positivity and Chandni, a girl who has lived her entire life being deprived of appreciation and under the shadows of her two elder sisters. Watch Agar as the experiences these three girls face in their life teach them the importance of balance, every Tuesday at 8PM.The main characters of Agar are played by one of the most prominent actors in the modern drama industry. The cast includes Junaid Khan as Shahwaiz, Juggan Kazim as Annie, Hina Altaf as Hooriya, Usama Khan as Farrukh, Ali Abbas as Muthair, Hina Khawaja Bayat as Annie’s mother, Maheen Siddiqui as Chandni, Ismat Zaidi as Shahwaiz’s mother, Ahmed Randhawa as Behram, Behroze Sabzwari as Shahwaiz’s father, Hira Soomro as Zainab, Beena Masroor as Muthair’s mother, Saqib Sumeer, Fareeda Shabbir as Zainab’s mother, Salma Asim as Farrukh’s mother. With its melodious, OST Agar is already among the top favorites of people across the country.The drama serial Agar also highlights the different aspects of parenthood as a whole. Presenting different familial situations where parents, force their children into living the life of their choosing, and how it affects their mental health and decision power in the long run. Agar as a whole encompasses all weighty themes emphasizing the strength of communication and understanding between parents and children and also the significance of considerate decisions. Watch as the experiences they face in their lives teach them the importance of balance, every Tuesday at 8 PM.

programme.title: Wabaal
programme.desc: Can a person’s own malicious thoughts cause them to be destructive not only for others but for themsleves as well? Watch Wabaal to find out.

programme.title: Bepanah
programme.desc: The story of two cousins Gul and Rushna who are polar opposites – one fearless and carefree while the other quiet and submissive. With just one wrong decision by Rushna both their lives change completely. But will this ill-judged decision by Rushna prove to be a blessing for Gul? Watch Bepanah to find out.

programme.title: Kaala Doriya
programme.desc: Namesake and based on one of the most popular folk songs, what happens when two families despise each other and the guy and girl end up falling in love? All hell breaks loose but in an entertaining and humorous way.Will they be able to cross the hurdles thrown their way by family or will they power through to come together as one? Watch Kaala Doriya to find out.

programme.title: Wabaal
programme.desc: Can a person’s own malicious thoughts cause them to be destructive not only for others but for themsleves as well? Watch Wabaal to find out.

programme.title: Tinkay Ka Sahara
programme.desc: With all her blood relatives failing her and being married to a person who isn’t even respected in his own house and is dependent on his family for finances, the protagonist played by Sonya Hussain struggles and finally works for a better tomorrow for her new family. However destiny has a different plan and the challenges in her life continue to grow. Is sadness, strive and grieve her only fate or will she ever find her forever happiness. Watch Tinkay Ka Sahara every Monday at 8PM to find out.

With its melodious, OST Agar is already among the top favorites of people across the country.The drama serial Agar also highlights the different aspects of parenthood as a whole. Agar as a whole encompasses all weighty themes emphasizing the strength of communication and understanding between parents and children and also the significance of considerate decisions. Watch as the experiences they face in their lives teach them the importance of balance, every Tuesday at 8 PM.

programme.title: Bepanah
programme.desc: The story of two cousins Gul and Rushna who are polar opposites – one fearless and carefree while the other quiet and submissive. With just one wrong decision by Rushna both their lives change completely. But will this ill-judged decision by Rushna prove to be a blessing for Gul? Watch Bepanah to find out.

programme.title: Wehem
programme.desc: Wehem is the story of a woman who leads an independent yet isolated life. While at the surface she seems caring, wonderful and filled with empathy for those around, the reality is very different. It isn’t until the drama’s lead, Kinza Hashmi reveals the truth about the negative protagonist played by Sawera Nadeem that those around become aware of her true colours.

Watch Tinkay Ka Sahara every Monday at 8PM to find out.

programme.title: Meri Shehzadi
programme.desc: The story of Dania, raised by her grandfather – a dedicated follower and admirer of Princess Diana to the extent that he calls his granddaughter with the same name. Will the moniker of the princess face the same trials, tribulations and difficulties as her?

programme.title: Bisaat
programme.desc: Bisat | The Ultimate Story Of Love, Sacrifices, And Conspiracies.

programme.title: Dobara
programme.desc: When destiny gives her another chance to be youthful again and make up for the years she lost, she takes a leap of faith. But at what cost?Dobara realistically depicts the reality of every other young girl who is made to age by eons in a matter of minutes and take on responsibility well above her age.Such is the tale of Mehrunissa, played by the singer turned actor who proved herself through her outstanding acting in Raqeeb Se, Hadiqa Kiani alongside the actor who delivers nothing but super-hits Bilal Abbas Khan who is playing the protagonist.

programme.title: Wehshi
programme.desc: Asif, a beloved son of his father becomes a victim of cruel fate when his father dies. With a step father that treats him poorly the built up anger and grieve reflects in Asif’s personality and that leads to him being labelled as Wehshi. Will this title lead to a self-fulfilling prophecy?Wehshi – Based on the novel by Razia Butt Sahiba. Dramatized and written by Shumaila Zaidi

programme.title: Bepanah
programme.desc: The story of two cousins Gul and Rushna who are polar opposites – one fearless and carefree while the other quiet and submissive. programme.title: Ishq-E-Laa
programme.desc: Embark on Ishq E Laa’s spiritual journey with a soulful young man lost in search of divinity and eternal love.For the first time ever, Azaan Sami Khan will be stepping into the acting world alongside the award winning Sajal Aly and Yumna Zaidi.Written by the peerless writer of Alif Allah Aur Insaan, Qaisera Hayat and directed by Amin Iqbal.

With its melodious, OST Agar is already among the top favorites of people across the country.The drama serial Agar also highlights the different aspects of parenthood as a whole. Presenting different familial situations where parents, force their children into living the life of their choosing, and how it affects their mental health and decision power in the long run. Agar as a whole encompasses all weighty themes emphasizing the strength of communication and understanding between parents and children and also the significance of considerate decisions. Watch as the experiences they face in their lives teach them the importance of balance, every Tuesday at 8 PM.

programme.title: Bepanah
programme.desc: The story of two cousins Gul and Rushna who are polar opposites – one fearless and carefree while the other quiet and submissive. With just one wrong decision by Rushna both their lives change completely. But will this ill-judged decision by Rushna prove to be a blessing for Gul? Watch Bepanah to find out.

programme.title: Wehem
programme.desc: Wehem is the story of a woman who leads an independent yet isolated life. While at the surface she seems caring, wonderful and filled with empathy for those around, the reality is very different. It isn’t until the drama’s lead, Kinza Hashmi reveals the truth about the negative protagonist played by Sawera Nadeem that those around become aware of her true colours.

programme.title: Wabaal
programme.desc: Can a person’s own malicious thoughts cause them to be destructive not only for others but for themsleves as well? Watch Wabaal to find out.

programme.title: Kaala Doriya
programme.desc: Namesake and based on one of the most popular folk songs, what happens when two families despise each other and the guy and girl end up falling in love? All hell breaks loose but in an entertaining and humorous way.Will they be able to cross the hurdles thrown their way by family or will they power through to come together as one? Watch Kaala Doriya to find out.

programme.title: Bepanah
programme.desc: The story of two cousins Gul and Rushna who are polar opposites – one fearless and carefree while the other quiet and submissive. With just one wrong decision by Rushna both their lives change completely. But will this ill-judged decision by Rushna prove to be a blessing for Gul? Watch Bepanah to find out.

programme.title: Tinkay Ka Sahara
programme.desc: With all her blood relatives failing her and being married to a person who isn’t even respected in his own house and is dependent on his family for finances, the protagonist played by Sonya Hussain struggles and finally works for a better tomorrow for her new family. However destiny has a different plan and the challenges in her life continue to grow. Is sadness, strive and grieve her only fate or will she ever find her forever happiness. Watch Tinkay Ka Sahara every Monday at 8PM to find out.

programme.title: Meri Shehzadi
programme.desc: The story of Dania, raised by her grandfather – a dedicated follower and admirer of Princess Diana to the extent that he calls his granddaughter with the same name. Will the moniker of the princess face the same trials, tribulations and difficulties as her?

programme.title: Agar
programme.desc: Agar is about a tale of three sisters, Qurrat ul ain, a girl who lived in the shadows of her image and dignity, Hooriya, a girl who lives in a world that only sees beauty and positivity and Chandni, a girl who has lived her entire life being deprived of appreciation and under the shadows of her two elder sisters. Watch Agar as the experiences these three girls face in their life teach them the importance of balance, every Tuesday at 8PM.The main characters of Agar are played by one of the most prominent actors in the modern drama industry. The cast includes Junaid Khan as Shahwaiz, Juggan Kazim as Annie, Hina Altaf as Hooriya, Usama Khan as Farrukh, Ali Abbas as Muthair, Hina Khawaja Bayat as Annie’s mother, Maheen Siddiqui as Chandni, Ismat Zaidi as Shahwaiz’s mother, Ahmed Randhawa as Behram, Behroze Sabzwari as Shahwaiz’s father, Hira Soomro as Zainab, Beena Masroor as Muthair’s mother, Saqib Sumeer, Fareeda Shabbir as Zainab’s mother, Salma Asim as Farrukh’s mother. With its melodious, OST Agar is already among the top favorites of people across the country.The drama serial Agar also highlights the different aspects of parenthood as a whole. Presenting different familial situations where parents, force their children into living the life of their choosing, and how it affects their mental health and decision power in the long run. Agar as a whole encompasses all weighty themes emphasizing the strength of communication and understanding between parents and children and also the significance of considerate decisions. Watch as the experiences they face in their lives teach them the importance of balance, every Tuesday at 8 PM.

programme.title: Dobara
programme.desc: When destiny gives her another chance to be youthful again and make up for the years she lost, she takes a leap of faith. But at what cost?Dobara realistically depicts the reality of every other young girl who is made to age by eons in a matter of minutes and take on responsibility well above her age.Such is the tale of Mehrunissa, played by the singer turned actor who proved herself through her outstanding acting in Raqeeb Se, Hadiqa Kiani alongside the actor who delivers nothing but super-hits Bilal Abbas Khan who is playing the protagonist.

programme.title: Wehshi
programme.desc: Asif, a beloved son of his father becomes a victim of cruel fate when his father dies. With a step father that treats him poorly the built up anger and grieve reflects in Asif’s personality and that leads to him being labelled as Wehshi. Will this title lead to a self-fulfilling prophecy?Wehshi – Based on the novel by Razia Butt Sahiba. Dramatized and written by Shumaila Zaidi
